amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 115-187 to encourage better coordination with state workforce development efforts and adds to the reporting requirements in Section 5 to describe efforts by the State to ensure nondisplacement and establish grievance procedures.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Foxx.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
